product.name: Eco-Dry Long-Sleeve Sports Top for Women
product.description: Achieve peak performance with our Eco-Dry Long-Sleeve Sports Top for Women. Made from fast-drying, breathable functional fabric, this top ensures maximum comfort during even the most intense workouts. The overlocked seams provide additional comfort, reducing chafing and irritation. Plus, some of the polyester content of the top is recycled, making it an eco-friendly choice for the environmentally conscious athlete. The top is designed to fit the female body, with a sleek and flattering cut that's perfect for any workout.
